meta_description: Welcome to the Mission Inn Foundation Take A Tour Step into history on a Mission Inn Museum tour, exploring the rich heritage of the City of Riverside. Tours
hours_text:
## Daily Tours

#### [Docent led Tours](https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/missioninnmuseum/items/?full-items=yes)

The Mission Inn Foundation Docents have been leading tours in downtown Riverside since 1989. Our dedicated volunteer docents have a love of history and a passion for sharing that through our tours.

#### [  

Historic Downtown Walking Tour](https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/missioninnmuseum/items/?full-items=yes)

The Historic Downtown Walking Tour takes you through the heart of downtown Riverside, California, offering participants a vibrant journey into the city’s storied past. This tour is offered daily.

[ ](https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/missioninnmuseum/items/?full-items=yes)

## Specialty Tours

##### Historic Walking Tours of Riverside

[](https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/missioninnmuseum/items/?full-items=yes)

#### [Historic Churches of Downtown riverside](https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/missioninnmuseum/items/?full-items=yes)

Experience the beauty and architectural history of Riverside's beloved churches. Your docent will share the stories of how these historical landmarks were built in the heart of our city.

[](https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/missioninnmuseum/items/?full-items=yes)

#### [  
  
Olivewood Cemetery Tour  
  
](https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/missioninnmuseum/items/?full-items=yes)

Sign up to experience Olivewood Cemetery, Riverside's often-overlooked memorial park established in 1888. This tour visits more than 40 gra...

## Welcome to the

# Mission Inn Foundation

##  Take A Tour 

Step into history on a Mission Inn Museum tour, exploring the rich heritage of the City of Riverside. Tours begin at our new storefront in Downtown Riverside: 3598 Main Street.  

[ LEARN MORE > ](https://www.missioninnmuseum.org/take-a-tour/)

##  Go Shopping 

Discover treasures at the Mission Inn Museum store—unique Riverside gifts, books, and souvenirs capturing the allure of the Mission Inn. Available at our new storefront in Downtown Riverside: 3750 Market St.

[ LEARN MORE > ](https://www.missioninnmuseum.shop/)

Skip to content
